module.name: scqcalert
module.author: Ewarnica project
module.description: *scqcalert* is a tool that, based on the evaluation of some parameters, allows monitoring and quality control of station acquisition, signal quality, and the automatic processing system.

parameter.name: qcFreqStore
parameter.description: Interval in minutes to send and stored alerts and notifications.

parameter.name: qcAlertDir
parameter.description: Path to store email content, json database and config files.

parameter.name: qcMsgtype
parameter.description: Message type imported from scqc to send new messages to scqcalert (report/alert).

parameter.name: listMsg
parameter.description: Messaging groups to connect. (Not working, to change messaging groups go to source code)

parameter.name: netWhitelist
parameter.description: List with networks allowed to process

parameter.name: netBlacklist
parameter.description: List with networks not allowed to process

parameter.name: locBlacklist
parameter.description: List with location codes not allowed to process

parameter.name: chanWhitelist
parameter.description: List with channels allowed to process

parameter.name: chanBlacklist
parameter.description: List with channels not allowed to process

parameter.name: psdDir
parameter.description: Path with npz files for psd evaluation

parameter.name: trig_max
parameter.description: Maximum number of triggers

parameter.name: pickName
parameter.description: scautopick alias name to extract config values (trigOn)

parameter.name: mag_max
parameter.description: Maximum magnitude value

parameter.name: pick_res_max
parameter.description: Maximum pick residual

parameter.name: qcMargin
parameter.description: Period in seconds to search for qc values (timing quality)

parameter.name: mag_res_max
parameter.description: Maximum magnitude residual

parameter.name: min_res_sample
parameter.description: Minimum number of pick and magnitude residuals

parameter.name: fdsnwsResp
parameter.description: fdsnws service to import response

parameter.name: psdPeriods
parameter.description: Periods to evaluate psd values

parameter.name: psdmin
parameter.description: Minimum PSD value

parameter.name: psdmax
parameter.description: Mimimum ratio STA/LTA logic to evaluate changes on PSDs

parameter.name: psdslmax
parameter.description: Maximum ratio STA/LTA logic to evaluate changes on PSDs

parameter.name: psd_numdays
parameter.description: Number of days to calculate LTA using PSDs average values

parameter.name: availThr
parameter.description: Percentage threshold to send alert on SDS data available
